text: Dare you join us on a journey into the minds that make Minecraft?
— The Narrator in How We Make Minecraft.

texts.text: For the Narrator in Minecraft: Story Mode, see Minecraft Story Mode:Narrator.
The Narrator is a character in the official Minecraft YouTube channel.
He narrated the series "How We Make Minecraft" and then co-hosted "The Secrets of Minecraft" with MARILLA from "Ten Things You Probably Didn't Know About Minecraft".

7 See also
8 References

The Narrator uses a skin made in the Bedrock Edition's Character creator. Starting with the Alex skin, his base is the Slender Skin with Cool Birch color, the hair is Short Slick colored Dark Brown, the eyes are Steely Stare colored Alex Green, the top is the Tuxedo Waistcoat, and the bottom is Alex's Pants.
The Narrator is calm, sarcastic, false factual, and somewhat egotistical.
Narrator in "How We Make Minecraft" and "The Secrets of Minecraft".
The description card on Minecraft's YouTube channel has him as "Untelligent," [sic] "Self-proclaimed Minecraft expert," etc. This changes each episode.
MARILLA and Narrator from the Secrets of Minecraft.
